alpha = ["a","b","c","d"]
#bucket = []		
			
l = len(alpha)					
height = 0
width = 0

r = 0

def add(bucket, baseIndex):
	copy = bucket.copy()
	for x in range(baseIndex+1,l):
		copy.append(alpha[x])
#		print( '+ ->' +  ''.join(copy))
		replace(copy,x)
	copy.clear()
#	print(bucket)
	
def replace(bucket, baseIndex):
	
	for x in range(baseIndex+1,l):
		copy = bucket.copy()
		copy.append(alpha[x])
		print(''.join(copy))
		copy.clear()

def init():
	bucket = []
	for x in range(0,l):
		bucket.append(alpha[x])
		

		print(''.join(bucket))
		replace(bucket,x)
		
		add(bucket, x)
		bucket.clear()
		
init()
